alert.note: Alert for Atlantic; Cape May; Cumberland (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 12:57AM EDT until July 29 at 1:30AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN ATLANTIC...EASTERN CUMBERLAND AND NORTHWESTERN CAPE MAY COUNTIES... At 1257 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Port Elizabeth, or near Millville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Vineland, Millville, Cumberland, Somers Point, Buena, Laurel Lake, Estell Manor, Corbin City, Mauricetown, Belleplain Forest, Leesburg, Mays Landing, English Creek, Port Norris, Dividing Creek, Dorothy, Bricksboro, Mizpah, Port Elizabeth and Bivalve. This includes Garden State Parkway between mile markers 31 and 32. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
